name: Village
_source: speak;Garcia;Jesus Christ.{w}{clear}Look at your feet.{w}{clear}{clear}I thought you guys were supposed to be rich!{w}{clear}I swear man,{w} I haven't felt this much pity since I trampled the neighbour's dog.{w}{clear}That sort of psychological damage is not something a horse can recover from.{w}{clear}Here, take these boots,{w} please,{w} for the love of God.{w}{clear}If I spend one more second looking at your raggedy kicks,{w} I'll hang myself.
